title: Bearpick
desc:
Post 2088-4
- One of the following will happen:
 - 50% Chance: Split number into 2 dice.
 - 33% Chance: Split number into 3 dice.
 - 17% Chance: Split number into 4 dice.
- Dice given by this card are stored for use in future turns, in place of whatever you rolled in said turns. Each die may be used once.
- Regardless of how many dice you gain, while their values are random, they will add up to the inputted number.
- Only drawable by players with (2088) Bear Potion in their Identity Zone.
